NewsArticle.Title: Hunting Area & Boss Drop Updates
NewsArticle.Content: Updates Hunting Area Updates * Increased Experience points and Gold drops in Nobis * Increased Experience Points in Chaos * Increased Experience and Ability points in Chadul Realms * Increased Rate of Spawns, Number of Spawns, Experience points and Gold drops in CR * Increased Rate of Spawns, Number of Spawns, Experience points in MTG Boss Drops * Increased the chance of obtaining "Arcella's Stolen Bag" from the Boss Yowien Thief. * Increased the chance of obtaining "Upgrade Plans" from the Boss Law.
